attributes.action: Ban smoking in cars with children in them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No child should be subjected to the affects of passive smoking due to sitting in a car when adults in the car are smoking. I have no wish to prevent adults who are on their own from smoking in the privacy of their own cars, but they should not be allowed to harm the health of kids at the same time Offending adults should be fined (cash/points) with maybe a jail sentence (e.g. 3 months) for repeat offenders

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
